channel.title: Thomas L. Friedman
channel.description: Thomas L. Friedman, a New York Times Op-Ed columnist, writes about foreign affairs, globalization and technology.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2017 The New York Times Company

item.title: A Road Trip Through Rusting and Rising America
item.description: The comeback of distressed and lost communities is the story of Bill Clinton’s America, not Donald Trump’s.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: It’s Chicken or Fish
item.description: Elected Republicans won’t stand up to Trump’s abuse of power, like his asking James Comey to halt the Flynn-Russia inquiry. So now you have a choice.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: Owning Your Own Future
item.description: Stop learning and you could find yourself without a job.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: Trump: Crazy Like a Fox, or Just Crazy?
item.description: The president’s remarks about his first 100 days have been simply bizarre.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: On a Par 5 in Dubai, Good Humor and a Respite From All Things Trump
item.description: Oh, and there’s this yogi with a flowing white beard and golf clothes.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: Coal Museum Sees the Future; Trump Doesn’t
item.description: The president is focused on prolonging a dying industry rather than on renewable energy, which is making the country stronger without him.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: Why Is Trump Fighting ISIS in Syria?
item.description: A strategy built on territory won’t ultimately eliminate the terrorist group.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: President Trump’s Real-World Syria Lesson
item.description: Doing nothing shouldn’t be an option.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: Trump Is a Chinese Agent
item.description: Ignoring climate change and the benefits of clean energy only helps a rival.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN

item.title: Calling On a Few Good Men
item.description: An open letter to the adults in the Trump administration with the most integrity.
item.author: By THOMAS L. FRIEDMAN
